description: This file defines API route handlers for managing knowledge base (KB) articles, including listing, retrieving, creating, updating, deleting, and searching articles using FastAPI framework.

methods.name: list_kb(repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Returns a list of all knowledge base articles.

methods.name: get_kb(article_id: int, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Retrieves a single KB article by its ID, raises 404 if not found.

methods.name: create_kb(payload: KBArticleCreate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Creates a new KB article with provided data.

methods.name: update_kb(article_id: int, payload: KBArticleUpdate, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Updates an existing KB article identified by ID.

methods.name: delete_kb(article_id: int, repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo))
methods.description: Deletes a KB article by ID, returns status.

methods.name: search_kb( q: str = Query(..., description="Search query string"), page: int = Query(1, ge=1, description="Page number (1-based)"), size: int = Query(50, ge=1, le=200, description="Page size"), repo: KBRepository = Depends(get_kb_repo), )
methods.description: Searches KB articles by query in title, content, and tags with pagination.
